SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

edu.fresno.uniobjects
Class UniDataConnection

java.lang.Object
  edu.fresno.uniobjects.UniDataConnection

public class UniDataConnection
extends Object

UniDataConnection allows you to connect to a UniData data source, and provides helpful functions for running queries.

Author:
Brandon Tilley

public static asjava.uniobjects.UniJava UniJava

The UniJava object is used to create and destroy sessions.

Constructor Detail

UniDataConnection

public UniDataConnection(String username,
                         String password,
                         String host,
                         String account)
Creates the connection object, passing in the connection parameters. Does not connect to the database, see connect().

Parameters:
username - The username to connect as
password - The password for username
host - The host to connect to
account - The account path to use
Method Detail

UniJava

public static asjava.uniobjects.UniJava UniJava()
Retrieves the internal UniJava object that is used to create/destroy sessions, etc. Added in 1.3 to replace direct access to UniJava.

Returns:
The internal UniJava object

connect

public void connect()
             throws asjava.uniclientlibs.UniConnectionException,
                    asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException
Uses UniJava.openSession() to create a new session and attempts to connect to the UniData data source.

Throws:
asjava.uniclientlibs.UniConnectionException - If there is an issue with the connection
asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException - If there is an issue with the session

disconnect

public void disconnect()
                throws asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException
Disconnects from the UniData data source using UniJava.closeSession().

Throws:
asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException - If there is an issue with the session
NullPointerException - If the session is null

query

public String query(String query)
             throws NotConnectedException,
                    asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException,
                    asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException
Executes a query on the UniData connection. Implements UniSession.Command.Exec().

Returns:
The response from the UniData data source
Throws:
NotConnectedException - If the UniData connection is not active
asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException - If there is an issue with the command
asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException - If there is an issue with the session

getFields

public List<FieldSet> getFields(String file,
                                String[] fields)
                         throws NotConnectedException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException
Convenience function for getFields(FieldDefinition) without having to create a new FieldDefinition.

Parameters:
file - The file to select from
fields - Array of field names to retrieve
Returns:
A list of FieldSets
Throws:
NotConnectedException - If the UniData connection is not active
asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException - If there is an issue with the command
asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException - If there is an issue with the session

getFields

public List<FieldSet> getFields(String file,
                                Map<String,String> fields)
                         throws NotConnectedException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException
Convenience function for getFields(FieldDefinition) without having to create a new FieldDefinition.

Parameters:
file - The file to select from
fields - Map of field names to friendly field names to retrieve, real field name first
Returns:
A list of FieldSets
Throws:
NotConnectedException - If the UniData connection is not active
asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException - If there is an issue with the command
asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException - If there is an issue with the session

getFields

public List<FieldSet> getFields(String file,
                                List<Field> fields)
                         throws NotConnectedException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException
Convenience function for getFields(FieldDefinition) without having to create a new FieldDefinition.

Parameters:
file - The file to select from
fields - List of Fields that specify what fields to retrieve
Returns:
A list of FieldSets
Throws:
NotConnectedException - If the UniData connection is not active
asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException - If there is an issue with the command
asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException - If there is an issue with the session

getFields

public List<FieldSet> getFields(String file,
                                Field[] fields)
                         throws NotConnectedException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException
Convenience function for getFields(FieldDefinition) without having to create a new FieldDefinition.

Parameters:
file - The file to select from
fields - Array of Fields that specify what fields to retrieve
Returns:
A list of FieldSets
Throws:
NotConnectedException - If the UniData connection is not active
asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException - If there is an issue with the command
asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException - If there is an issue with the session

getFields

public List<FieldSet> getFields(FieldDefinition fieldDefinition)
                         throws NotConnectedException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException,
                                asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException
Executes a special LIST query on the UniData data source to retrieve certain fields. FieldDefinition defines which file and fields, as well as other parameters, to select data from.

Parameters:
fieldDefinition - The FieldDefinition that defines the data to retrieve
Returns:
A list of FieldSets
Throws:
NotConnectedException - If the UniData connection is not active
asjava.uniobjects.UniCommandException - If there is an issue with the command
asjava.uniobjects.UniSessionException - If there is an issue with the session

parseIntoFieldset

protected List<FieldSet> parseIntoFieldset(String data,
                                           FieldDefinition fieldDefinition)
Given the data from a query() call and a fieldDefinition, this function parses the data out into FieldSets for ease-of-use.

Parameters:
data - The data from query()
fieldDefinition - The FieldDefinition used
Returns:
A List of FieldSets which contains the Fields with data

Determines if the connection is active or not

Returns:
